summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5906 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 52, John H. Nagle's Second Addition, being the alley between 10th Avenue North and 11th Avenue North, from East Thomas Street to East John Street; and certain other streets; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 77933, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
